messages.subject: Re: Attachment Parenting
messages.messageBody:
<< Faith wrote: That isn't what conservative Christian parenting is about. We
lovingly guide our kids, and nurture the beautiful personality that God has
placed in our hands.
>>

Faith,
Here is one quote that I pointedly remember, and it is what I was
talking about when I said that you didn't seem to think that Conservative
Christians could use Attachment Parenting. After this quote you use it to
bring home your point of corporal punishment. To me, that stresses that you
think corporal punishment is the only way Conservative Christians raise their
children, so as a Conservative Christian myself, I had to point out that it
was not true, as we use Attachment Parenting.
However in your last answer to my post, you say that you have never
suggested such a thing. This is just one of many quotes from you that do
suggest that very same thing. If I went through my deleted mail, I could
find many more. Anyway, I just wanted to clarify my reason for standing up
for those Christians who do us AP.
Tami
